edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc
Interface DocSearchEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
LuceneSearchEngine
public interface DocSearchEngine

An abstract interface representing a search engine used by a DocBackEndLSP to index and access its collection. The DocBackEndLSP relies on this class to answer all query, meta-attributes, and content-summary requests.

If it is using the filesystem for persistence, a search engine should save its index in the same directory as all the other configuration files for a DocBackEndLSP: SDARTS_HOME/config/backEndLSPName.

SDARTS includes a reference implementation for the search engine, based on the Lucene search engine. This is in the edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.lucene package.
